segments.pli: “Rañño, bhikkhave, cakkavattissa pātubhāvā sattannaṃ ratanānaṃ pātubhāvo hoti.
segments.en: “Mendicants, when a Wheel Turning Monarch appears seven treasures appear.

segments.pli: Cakkaratanassa pātubhāvo hoti, hatthiratanassa pātubhāvo hoti, assaratanassa pātubhāvo hoti, maṇiratanassa pātubhāvo hoti, itthiratanassa pātubhāvo hoti, gahapatiratanassa pātubhāvo hoti, pariṇāyakaratanassa pātubhāvo hoti.
segments.en: The wheel, the elephant, the horse, the jewel, the woman, the treasurer, and the counselor.

segments.pli: Rañño, bhikkhave, cakkavattissa pātubhāvā imesaṃ sattannaṃ ratanānaṃ pātubhāvo hoti.
segments.en: When a Wheel Turning Monarch appears these seven treasures appear.

segments.pli: Tathāgatassa, bhikkhave, pātubhāvā arahato sammāsambuddhassa sattannaṃ bojjhaṅgaratanānaṃ pātubhāvo hoti.
segments.en: When a Realized One, a perfected one, a fully awakened Buddha appears the seven treasures of the awakening factors appear.

segments.pli: Satisambojjhaṅgassa ratanassa pātubhāvo hoti … pe … upekkhāsambojjhaṅgassa ratanassa pātubhāvo hoti.
segments.en: The treasures of the awakening factors of mindfulness, investigation of principles, energy, rapture, tranquility, immersion, and equanimity.

segments.pli: Tathāgatassa, bhikkhave, pātubhāvā arahato sammāsambuddhassa imesaṃ sattannaṃ bojjhaṅgaratanānaṃ pātubhāvo hotī”ti.
segments.en: When a Realized One, a perfected one, a fully awakened Buddha appears these seven treasures of the awakening factors appear.”

sections.title: “Mendicants, when a Wheel Turning Monarch appears seven treasures…

suttaplex.blurb: As the Wheel-turning Monarch manifests seven treasures, the Realized One manifests the seven awakening factors.
